body: Ye invited a wolf to your own home so you only have yourself to blame

Was good despite being ntr. What wasn't so great was hearing about her past sexual partners. Especially hearing about how she was violated by her 30yr older uncle, giving titfucks to every guy in school, and fucking men old enough to be her father. I don't see how people find it hot, it's just nasty to me. Instant turn off in my book.
This is light NTR :3...the kind of NTR that's legal xD, even tho I'm not an NTR fan,this is kinda good :3
Isn't this a Netori ? The MC steals someone's wife in the end after all.

@rogron: I can see where you're coming from, so to speak, in regards to the prostitution tag's validity, or lack thereof. However, as there is a monetary exchange as a form of compensation, it's also very easily argued that there is prostitution, in a manner of speaking. Really, if you think about it, the nameless "procreatagonist" (ba-dum tsssh!) is selling himself, after all.
Not prostitution ether and not really ntr ether.   Whos taging this stuff!?!?
Indeed. This isn't actually NTR though, and inappropriate tags always bother me... That has nothing to do with the actual work, of course.
Always a pleasure to see full color. The wife is fantastic.
